alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 3:14AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Periods of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
